front.title: IEC/IEEE International Standard Power transformers --Part 57-1202: Liquid immersed phase-shifting transformers

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This part of IEC 60076 covers the requirements for phase-shifting transformers of all types. The scope excludes transformers with an unregulated phase shift. This document is limited to matters particular to phase-shifting transformers and does not include matters relating to general requirements for power transformers covered in existing standards in the IEC 60076 series or IEEE Std C57.12.00TM and IEEE Std C57.12.10TM.
